alert.note: Alert for Concho; Irion; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 9:28PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Tom Green, southwestern Concho and eastern Irion Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 928 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over O.C. Fisher Reservoir, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Angelo, Mertzon, Christoval, Wall, Orient, San Angelo State Park, Twin Buttes Reservoir, Sherwood, Grape Creek, Goodfellow Air Force Base, Carlsbad, Veribest, Knickerbocker, Arden, Vancourt, O.C. Fisher Reservoir, Lake Nasworthy, Tankersley, Us-67 Near The Irion- Tom Green County Line and Harriet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
